Articles.Content:
Some time ago, I've seen a mod that adds folding wheels (just like these on Curiosity). The problem is that I can't find that thread now Forum search and Google returned nothing.

Please help Note: it's NOT Portable Rover Components mod.

Lionhead Aerospace has a curiosity clone, not sure how good the wheels are

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/12106-0-24-Lionhead-Aerospace-Inc-Easter-Egg-hunt

if not you could try TT's modular multiwheels, but i don't think he has curiosity-style rover wheels...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93205-0-24-2-TT-s-Modular-MultiWheels-7

if not, start trawling through the mods and plugins library

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library

Unlikely, but is it this? There really isn't that many mods that add wheels.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84102-WIP-PARTS-PLUGIN-0-24-2-Kerbal-Foundries-wheels-anti-grav-repulsors-and-tracks

P.s. Maybe this is helpful

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/82341

Edited October 23, 2014 by Las-pen
